argument.name: tablename
argument.description: A non-null character string. Table_Name must be fully qualified if it is not the primary table for the associated form.

page.description: Returns TRUE if the record pointer is at the beginning of the file with respect to the current index.
page.discussion: *IBOF() returns True (.T.) if the current record is also the first record of the current index; otherwise returns False (.F.) if the current record is not the first record of the current index.

section.title: Example
section.description: Create a calculated value for a form. Set the value of the calculated value to *ibof(). It will display .T. (TRUE) when you are display the first record of an index and .F. (FALSE) when displaying all other records.

page.limitations: Applies to Alpha Anywhere tables only.
